'''''Amon Hen'' 135''' is the one-hundred-and-thirty-fifth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in September [[1995]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Lost Beginnings''
** By: Howard J. Bates
* The View from the Hill (Editorial)
** By: Richard Fraser Overton
* Contents
* News from the Bywater Post Office and General Store
** By: Malcolm Lindley
* Advertisements
* Tolkien's Star & Tolkien's Heirs
** By: [[Ruth Lacon]]
* Drinking in Middle-earth
** By: Andrew Wells
* Crossword Solution
* The Hunger
** By: Gordon Palmer
* Artwork: ''Galadriel''
** By: Juliette Cresswell
* The Subject of Ents, Entwives & Huorns in the Old Forest
** By: Timothy M. Farr
* Terry, Tolkien & the Net
** By: Kevin Nicholas
* The Thoughts of a Departing Elf
** By: Timothy M. Farr
* Artwork: ''Gandalf at Orthanc''
** By: Gordon Palmer
* Mathom
** By: Jason Finch
* Odd-One-Out
** By: Paul Cockburn
* Letters to the Editor
* Hildifons's Half of Amon Hen
** By: [[Sumner Gary Hunnewell|Gary Hunnewell]]
* Tolk Folk
* Committee
